welcome.title: More than just shorter links
welcome.description: Build your brand's recognition and get detailed insights on how your links are performing

onboard.description_1: Boos your brand recognition with each click. Genereci links don't mean a thing. Branded links help instil confidence in your content.
onboard.description_2: Gain insights into who is clicking your links. Knowing when and where people engage with your content helps inform better decisions
onboard.description_3: Improve brand awareness and content discoverability through customizable links, supercharging audience engagement

url_short.title: Let's get started!
url_short.description: Paste your first link into the field to shorten it
